Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.procedure

Class TestHBCKSCP

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.procedure.TestSCPBase
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.procedure.TestHBCKSCP
public class TestHBCKSCP extends TestSCPBase
Test of the HBCK-version of SCP. The HBCKSCP is an SCP only it reads hbase:meta for list of Regions that were on the server-to-process rather than consult Master in-memory-state.
